Package com.brightcove.player.controller

Interface Summary
SourceSelector Defines methods provided by any class that allows for selection of a Source within a Video object by some set of rules or logic.
 

Class Summary
DefaultSourceSelectionController Provides a default SourceSelector controller implementation for the Video Cloud SDK that will automatically select a Source rendition based on the following rules: If an HLS source rendition exists use it (there should be only one, if any) If no HLS renditions exists, but MP4 renditions exist, use the rendition that is closest to 256 kBps If no HLS or MP4 renditions exist, throw a NoSourceFoundException
SeamlessSourceSelectionController  
VideoPlaybackController Manages video playback and provides proper translation between the Brightcove representation of videos and the underlying platform's representation.
 

Exception Summary
NoSourceFoundException Indicates that during a search for a suitable Source rendition, none could be found.
